localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: Unai is both a VR headset and a virtual world designed specifically for it. The hardware and software are being built together to make spending time with people in VR feel the same as in real life.
blogPost.body: Unai is both a VR headset and a virtual world designed specifically for it. The hardware and software are being built together to make spending time with people in VR feel the same as in real life.
blogPost.title: Unai - A VR headset & world designed for real social interactions
blogPost.author: Naval Ravikant

localize.description: Unai既是一款VR头显，也是一个专门为它设计的虚拟世界。软硬件共同打造，让在VR中与人相处的感觉和现实生活中一样。
localize.tagline: 一款专为真实社交互动而设计的VR头显与世界。

localize.description: Unai既是一款VR頭顯，也是一個專門爲它設計的虛擬世界。軟硬件共同打造，讓在VR中與人相處的感覺和現實生活中一樣。
localize.tagline: 一款專爲真實社交互動而設計的VR頭顯與世界。

previous.title:
Deutsche Bank will no longer do business with Trump or any of his companies. Trump reportedly owes the bank over $300 million.

Meanwhile, Signature Bank called for Trump to step down. https://t.co/4SzdAxI9vl

localize.full_text:
德意志银行将不再与特朗普或他的任何公司开展业务。据报道，特朗普欠该银行3亿多美元。

与此同时，签名银行呼吁特朗普下台。https://t.co/4SzdAxI9vl。

德意志銀行將不再與特朗普或他的任何公司開展業務。據報道，特朗普欠該銀行3億多美元。

與此同時，簽名銀行呼籲特朗普下臺。https://t.co/4SzdAxI9vl。

next.excerpt: Teamflow is a virtual office for your team to hang out. Bring back the camaraderie of being in the office, the energy of working in the same room, the spontaneity of hallway conversations. ⠀ The joy of feeling like a team again.
next.title: Teamflow - Feel like a team again with your own virtual office

localize.description: Teamflow是一个虚拟的办公室，让你的团队在这里闲逛。让您重拾在办公室的情谊，重拾在同一房间工作的活力，重拾在走廊上交谈的自发性。⠀ 再次感受到团队的快乐。
localize.tagline: 拥有自己的虚拟办公室，重新感受团队的力量。

localize.description: Teamflow是一個虛擬的辦公室，讓你的團隊在這裏閒逛。讓您重拾在辦公室的情誼，重拾在同一房間工作的活力，重拾在走廊上交談的自發性。⠀ 再次感受到團隊的快樂。
localize.tagline: 擁有自己的虛擬辦公室，重新感受團隊的力量。
